# vfs_getvfs

**Function**

Given a filesystem ID, look up a mount structure.

## Declaration

```swift
mount_t vfs_getvfs(fsid_t *fsid);
```

## Parameters

- **fsid**: Filesystem ID to look up.

## Return Value

Mountpoint if found, else NULL. Note unmounting mountpoints can be returned.
title: vfs_getvfs
